description:
78 is a puzzle/adventure game. Use the boy to go through suspicious rooms and trials
We aim to return safely to the real world.
There are various thoughts as we go through the ordeal, but we still have to persevere until the end.

The game aspect of 78 was a lot of reference to the atmosphere of the RPG maker game.
It can help your play by looking around and looking for things that might help.

Synopsis

● A boy comes home at dawn, lamenting his condition and trying to sleep.
The boy falls asleep and wakes up to the alarm, but the room feels strange.
After that, you will be taken to a strange room and try to escape from that room.

feature

● 78 There are three trials in total. At each gate, there is something to enjoy, such as puzzles and mazes.

● Realistic graphics and soundtrack for each ordeal

● Guess the hidden story through puzzles and riddles!

● It is a form in which the player and the main character think together and solve the problem.

how to play

● You can move with the keyboard arrow keys.

● Press the space bar to start a conversation.

● During the game, if a selection appears on the screen, you can click it with the mouse.

● For the English version, enter the library attribute and change it to 78eng in the beta file.

● 1024 * 768(resolution) is recommended.
